pages.text: Who begins creation, again, will cause it to return and Who provides you from the heaven and the earth. Is there a god besides God? Say: Prepare your proof if you had been ones who are sincere
Say: None knows who is in the heavens and the earth, nor the unseen but God. Nor are they aware when they will be raised up
Nay! Their knowledge of the world to come failed. Nay! They are in uncertainty about it. Nay! They are in the dark about it
And those who were ungrateful said: When we had been earth dust like our fathers will we, truly, be ones who are brought out
Certainly, we were promised this, we and our fathers before. Truly, this is nothing but fables of the ancient ones
Say: Journey through the earth; then, look on how had been the Ultimate End of the ones who sin
And feel thou not remorse for them, nor be troubled by what they plan
And they say: When is the promise if you had been ones who are sincere
Say: Perhaps coming close behind you be some of that which you seek to hasten
And, truly, thy Lord is Possessor of Grace for humanity, but most of them give not thanks
And, truly, thy Lord knows what their breasts hide and what they speak openly
Not is that which is absent in the heaven and the earth, but that it is in the clear Book
Truly, this, the Quran, relates about the Children of Israel and most of what they are at variance in it
